page.title: 13COMMERCE AND INDUSTRY CONT.
page.content: In the north-west, despite the {urban development}and new road system, farming (both arable and dairy) still takes place on a limited basis. At the Rowditch site a large expanse of{derelict land}has been reclaimed by refilling with rubbish and now forms a basis for a developing industrial estate. A new supermarket is planned for this site as well. Hazel Woods foods have an advanced cold storage site for all types of frozen foods. A consignment from Sutton Bridge in Lincolnshire arrived by truck at the time of survey. Also on the site is a joinery specialising in window and door frames. The Macmillan group have a major printing and distribution centre here and there is also a firm which dismantles cars.
